page.title: 06TOURIST FACILITIES
page.content: OPENING HOURS VARY WITH THE TIME OF THE YEAR AND FOR THE FOUR MAIN ATTRACTIONS OF MANSION, GARDENS, HOME FARM AND OLD HALL. THE PARK AND GARDENS REMAIN OPEN TO VISITORS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.MANY EVENTS TAKE PLACE IN THE PARK AND HALLS. {GUIDE BOOKS, LEAFLETS, GIFTS AND {SOUVENIRS}ARE ON SALE AT THE NATIONAL TRUST SHOP. THE STABLE BLOCK WHICH ONCE HOUSED AS MANY AS 5O HORSES HAS THE{LICENSED {TATTON ARMS AND SELF SERVICE {RESTAURANT}CAPABLE OF SERVING I2O. A STAFF OF 5 FULL TIME AND UP TO 25 PART TIME ENJOY THEIR WORK IN THESE PLEASANT SURROUNDINGS { A TUCK SHOP}SELLS ICE CREAMS, SWEETS AND CRISPS.{PLANTS AND GARDEN PRODUCE ARE ON SALE IN THE GARDEN CENTRE.
